userreviews.userReview: I loved this autobiography of Dr. Stanley! I have read several of his books and have admired him and his preaching for many years, so when a friend asked if I wanted to borrow her copy of this book, I jumped at the opportunity! I knew I wouldn't be disappointed, and I was right. I was so impressed by his unswerving faith and how he has let God fight his battles for him especially when things looked bleak. I grieved for him during the loss of his marriage because I was going through a divorce at the same time, and I could empathize with him. The love of his life had walked away from him, just as the love of my life had walked away from me. I was sorry to read of the difficulties he had with his son, Andy, but happy that they seemed able to mend their fences. I could identify with many of the situations he described, and was glad that by giving God complete trust and control, he was able to rise above the strife. And isn't that what God wants from all of us--trust, obedience, and following God's plan for our lives? I'm going to recommend this book to my pastor and all of my friends.

Tracing the chronology of his life by showing how faith influenced each turn, Charles Stanley gives a clear portrayal of how a life lived in gratitude, submission, and obedience to God can be used for His glory and encourages the reader to follow his example. Dr. Stanley writes, "I pray that through my life's story, you can see all that the Savior can do through the life of an ordinary person who serves an extraordinary God." Throughout the book, Dr. Stanley's unswerving faith and dependency on God in the face of all kinds of trials is truly inspiring.

A Birthday present from my mom. Perfect timing. God's will for my life is where I want to be. Other distractions are just that. It seems so simple, but it takes practice. So many things demand our attention, while we run around feeling inadequate to do it all. This book reminded me that God has the strength that I don't. He has a plan and a purpose in all things. I trust Him with everything.

Lean on the Lord, go to Him in prayer for everything, exercise courageous faith always! This is Dr. Charles Stanley's thesis. Reading about his life, the events that propelled him into ministry and the wonderful ways in which the Lord worked in his life was inspiring. This memoir was a quick read and I hated to finish it and put it down.

Courageous Faith is the story of the life of Charles Stanley and his walk with the Lord. His story is very similar to the apostle Paul. There were many hardships in each's life. Charles Stanley also points out things we should be doing in our lives to glorify God. I highly recommend this book for a new Christian and the not so new Christian.

I don't think I have ever met someone who had a heart for God at a young age and did not waver in his commitment. Charles Stanley tells his story beginning with his childhood to present. Along with the biography, he includes some principles that he followed and learned along the way. His best advice: Do what God says is right and leave the consequences to Him.

Great book learned a lot about Dr. Stanley.This is a great read to help Chris's in there walk of faith. If you want to be courageous in your faith this book is for you. This book will help your relationship with Jesus Christ.

Pastor Stanley is an incredible man of faith. I love and admire this man, he has been a blessing to me for many years. Trust and obey, for there is no other way. To be happy in Jesus but to trust and obey.
Good book.
wonderful book!
Great, encouraging Biography of Charles Stanley! Definitely worth reading!
Powerful stories with spiritual lessons. Powerful stories from the life and ministry of Charles Stanley. Spiritual lessons about our good, wise, strong, and faithful God. A very encouraging read.
Wonderful example of following Jesus.

I enjoyed this memoir-ish hardcover. Stanley is a man who worked very hard and deliberately towards his unshakeable goals and principles against some pretty long odds coming from his place of entry into the world. The message ultimately is, in my opinion, God has a plan for you, listen to him carefully; don't miss it, act on it.

Charles Stanley’s sermons and walk with God have strongly influenced my outlook on life in general, as I’ve heard him preach since I was a little girl… My mom listened to his sermons on radio and cassette while she did housework and drove – such a blessing! (Even if your children don’t seem to be listening, I really believe, from my own experience, that hearing godly teaching is so beneficial to their walk with God as they get older.) So, when I heard that Dr. Stanley was writing an autobiography, I was thrilled. This autobiography was not a disappointment, either — Like he always has, in his autobiography, Stanley continues to give God all the credit for any “achievements” and continually points his readers to “obey God, and leave all the consequences to Him.” If you are looking for incredible encouragement from a man who has withstood – by the grace of God – incredible trials in his walk of faith, pick up this not-too-long-to-read autobiography. Highly, highly recommended.

Charles F. Stanley is an absolutely fine fellow who has a worldwide message. Through Mr. Stanley's experiences we can find peace & hope reflected in our own lives. With total devotion & obedience Mr. Stanley has pursued an amazing & wonderful path to the riches & glory of Christ, once found always shared. Throughout his ministry Mr. Stanley has developed a keen sense of our Lord's presence, and as said "shared" for our benefit and betterment, Mr. Stanley gives us the awareness of how near Jesus is to our hearts, and how close we are to His love which nothing can separate us from.
I was greatly blessed by this book!I was greatly blessed by this book! The reader will see how incredible Jesus was in Dr. Stanley's life and how Jesus is more than willing to do the same in theirs.

At 83 years of age it was time for Dr. Stanley to write the autobiography of his life, which he has done beautifully, recording how God has worked repeatedly and, at times, miraculously, to come to his aid and expand his ministry worldwide. Dr. Stanley's sermons just get better and better, I've noticed. His personal life experiences clearly inform his messages and are inspiring to many, including me personally. If you love Charles Stanley, you will love this book.

This book was amazing! As a member of First Baptist Church of Atlanta, I never expected Dr. Stanley's life would be like this. His journey and the hardships he faced has strengthen me to have a stronger relationship with God. The way God has used him to spread the word to others and make miracles has touched me.

Wonderful book by an awesome man of God, Dr Stanley is such a thorough teacher of God's word. I try not to miss any of his In Touch broadcast, and I have also visited his church, what an experience that I will never forget. God Bless and keep this man of God. Again a wonderful book.

A Man of IntegrityI chose this rating because I was impressed with the faith and integrity of Charles' relationship with God, as exemplified in this autobiography. This book sets forth a wonderful example of how believers should walk and serve God.

Good book! Pastor Dr. Charles Stanley speaks of his faith, trust, and devotion to God throughout his life and of God's faithfulness and blessings to him. Watching his sermons every Saturday on TV, he's taught me much about God and the Bible. Inspirational!

A must read. I learned so much from his life reading this book and it kind of answers the questions I had about his marriage and divorce in 2000. After reading this book, I have a greater admiration of him. God bless him and give him many more years of life!
This book is amazing highly recommend!!!!!! Love Charles Stanley and His love for the Lord!!!
And inspiring autobiography.
Charles Stanley is one of my favorite pastors. His messages have been a tremendous help and encouragement to me. Some great lessons and very inspiring.

description: As trusted pastor Dr. Charles Stanley comes to the later years of his life, he is ready to share his personal story—on a more intimate level than ever before. As he walks us through his ups and downs, he shares how the biblical principles he’s taught all his life affected the way he’s actually lived.In this new book from Dr. Charles Stanley, he looks his readers in the eye and says, This is how my faith has worked for me at the most challenging times of my life and how it has led me to the victories God had in store for me. As Dr. Stanley looks back over his long life of ministry, he is now ready to share how his personal faith choices directed his every step. He shares how God walked with him through his most difficult days as a pastor when he faced internal conflict in a church he’d led for years. He gently shares painful family issues that brought him to his knees and taught him to look to God for answers when life wasn’t simple and trite answers didn’t work. Dr. Stanley reminds us that choosing to follow and obey God when life is hard can be both the toughest and best thing we’ll ever do. As Dr. Stanley reflects on the biblical teachings that have led him through his difficulties and joys, he always comes back to this principle: Do what God says is right and leave the consequences to Him—no matter what that means.
title: Courageous Faith
